content.description: You will listen to a radio interview with an executive of an airline company.
content.question: La compagnia low cost di cui si parla nell’intervista acquista in blocco Boeing 737 perché

choices.label: sono moderni e facili da pilotare

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
